pending.description: Váš účet má nevyřízené nebo chybějící údaje. Dokončete proces zapojení pro správu plateb.

create.title: Nastavte Váš Stripe účet
create.description: Musíte vytvořit a připojit Stripe účet, abyste mohli přijímat výplaty. Začněte proces nastavení nyní.
create.warning: Ujistěte se, že jste vybrali svou zemi. Později si ji nebudete moci změnit a nesprávná volba může způsobit nepoužitelnost Vašeho účtu.

AUTOMATIC.label: Automaticky
AUTOMATIC.description: Daňové chování bude nastaveno podle měny nákupu. Při USD a CAD se použije daň exkluzivní, takže bude přičtena k ceně. U všech ostatních měn bude daň zahrnuta do ceny.

INCLUSIVE.label: Zahrnuta
INCLUSIVE.description: Daň bude zahrnuta do kupní ceny - cena bude obsahovat výši daně.

EXCLUSIVE.label: Exkluzivní
EXCLUSIVE.description: Daň nebude zahrnuta do kupní ceny – k ceně bude připočtena daň.

tooltip.not-logged-in: You must be logged-in to filter.

error.not-logged-in: You must be logged to like.

hero.headline: Discover Amazing Creators
hero.title: Find Your Inspiration
hero.description: Explore a vibrant community of creators who turn their passions into extraordinary work. Dive into diverse art, stories, and innovations—all in one place.

hero.headline: Complete Creative Control
hero.title: Turn your passion into purpose
hero.description: Empower your creativity on a platform that values your work. With low fees, customizable pages, and direct engagement tools, we make monetizing your passion simple and rewarding. Join a community where every creator has a voice, and start building your success story today.

step-1.headline: Step 1: Create Your Account
step-1.title: Launch Your Creative Career
step-1.description: Join a platform built for creators—artists, educators, writers—to grow your audience and income. Benefit from a 0-9% platform fee and tools to monetize your craft from day one. Share your voice and build a community that supports your work.

features.1: Keep more of your earnings with industry-leading rates.
features.2: Instant notifications for new followers, tips, and subscriptions.
features.3: Attract early supporters with custom discount codes.

step-2.headline: Step 2: Customize Your Space
step-2.title: Design a Home for Your Creativity
step-2.description: Design a page that mirrors your brand with logos, banners, and themes. Organize content using smart tags for discoverability and offer free previews, subscriptions, or VIP tiers to engage your audience.

features.1: Fully customizable layouts, themes, and visuals.
features.2: Label posts (e.g., “Tutorials,” “Exclusive Drops”) for seamless navigation.
features.3: Build subscriptions, paywalled content, or/and VIP access tiers.

step-3.headline: Step 3: Share Your Work
step-3.title: Engage, Innovate, Thrive
step-3.description: Post images, videos, or stories instantly. Use polls, Q&A, and live events to connect deeply with supporters. Track engagement via analytics and host real-time launches to grow your community.

features.1: Post images, videos, text, and audio effortlessly.
features.2: Track engagement trends with polls, Q&A stats, and analytics.
features.3: Host real-time events with alerts to hype launches or milestones.

fees.title: All-Inclusive 0-9% Fee
fees.description: Keep 91-100% of your earnings—no hidden payment processing fees, transaction cuts, or surprises. What you earn is what you keep.

alerts.title: Live Supporter Alerts
alerts.description: Celebrate milestones instantly with real-time notifications for new followers, tips, and subscriptions.

coupons.title: Audience Coupons
coupons.description: Boost loyalty by sharing custom discount codes for exclusive content or early access.

tags.title: Smart Content Tags
tags.description: Organize posts effortlessly (e.g., “Tutorials,” “Behind-the-Scenes”) to help fans find what they love.

branding.title: Custom Branding Studio
branding.description: Design a page that screams you—logos, banners, and themes tailored to your style.

tiers.title: Unlimited Content Tiers
tiers.description: Build subscriptions, VIP access, or free previews to cater to every type of supporter.

cta.title: Seize the Moment, Elevate Your Business.
cta.description: Unleash the full potential of your creative enterprise. Engage and grow your audience with enticing public previews of your podcasts and videos. Welcome fans into your community at no initial cost, offering a taste of your unique content with the freedom to upgrade anytime. Embrace effortless growth, without the worry.

error.title: Post Not Found
error.description: We were unable to find your desired post.

search.placeholder: Let's try to search for the creator instead.
